name: Content Summarization Prompt
description: Summarizes long content into concise, actionable summaries

ai_signature.name: content_summarizer

inputs.focus_areas: Specific areas to focus on in summary

ai_signature.instruction: Create a concise, actionable summary that captures the essential information and provides clear next steps.

template_content:
Summarize the following content into a concise, actionable summary:

[CONTENT]

Please provide:
1. Executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Key points (bullet list)
3. Action items (if any)
4. Recommendations (if applicable)

Keep the summary focused and practical.
